org.modelio.api.diagram.tools

Interface IDiagramCommand

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IAttachedBoxCommand, IBoxCommand, ILinkCommand, IMultiLinkCommand
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultAttachedBoxCommand, DefaultBoxCommand, DefaultLinkCommand, DefaultMultiLinkCommand

    public interface IDiagramCommand
    Basic definition of a command for the diagram palette.
    It must provide a label, a tooltip and a bitmap.
